course.subject: FINA
course.name: Financial Modeling
course.description: This is a course about financial modeling.  The goal is to make financial models that produce useful answers to economic questions.  Selected topics which lend themselves to financial modeling will be covered, such as (but not limited to) loan amortization schedules; valuation and private equity; equity derivatives; mutual fund performance and style analysis; fixed income derivatives, and optimal portfolio selection.
course.prerequisites: FINA 5120, FINA 5210 and FINA 5290
